definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: This will be an on-going monthly task.
sentences.chinese: 這將是一個持續的月度任務。

sentences.english: Honda sets all-time monthly record for production in China.
sentences.chinese: 本田在華產量創空前月度記錄。

sentences.english: This was the system that produced "the facts" in Geneen's leather-bound monthly report.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲吉寧的皮封面月度報告提供“事實”的體制。

sentences.english: We are more concerned about the two indicators are asset-liability ratio and monthly cash flow.
sentences.chinese: 我們比較關注的兩個指標是資產負債率和月度現金流。

sentences.english: Such a major decline in monthly foreign trade is rare in the 30 years of reform and opening up.
sentences.chinese: 這是自改革開放30年來極爲少見的月度外貿額下跌。

sentences.english: I am very pleased to be awarded the "Monthly Star" of our "Winning Ways".
sentences.chinese: 榮獲這次“致勝之道”的月度之星，我很高興。

sentences.english: Facilitate the monthly toll fee settlement with the co-packer.
sentences.chinese: 推進代加工廠的月度加工費結算。

sentences.english: To supervise monthly tax adjustment and booking.
sentences.chinese: 管理月度稅務調整和入賬。

sentences.english: But we can only read so much into today's monthly report.
sentences.chinese: 但從這份月度報告中，我們也只能讀出這些信息。

sentences.english: I have also used it to go through daily logs and generate a monthly report.
sentences.chinese: 我還曾用該技術來遍歷每天的日誌並生成月度報告。

sentences.english: Building on the success of Goldston's column, Nature will shortly introduce two new monthly columnists.
sentences.chinese: 基於上述成功，《自然》即將推出兩個月度專欄作家。

sentences.english: Mark: When do you send out the monthly statements?
sentences.chinese: 你們一般都是幾號寄出月度的結算單？

sentences.english: Be responsible for the monthly state tax & local tax declaration.
sentences.chinese: 負責國稅和地稅的月度申報工作。

sentences.english: As a result, A's monthly sales dropped to 8,000 pairs.
sentences.chinese: 結果是，公司A的月度銷售量降爲8000雙。

sentences.english: We don't give bonus every month, but we offer a sem-annual bonuses.
sentences.chinese: 我們不發月度獎，而是每半年發一次獎金。

sentences.english: The latest monthly figures show a growing surplus in China's overseas trade.
sentences.chinese: 最新的月度統計數字表明中國外貿順差進一步增長。

definition: monthly (used in names of publications)/monthly bulletin
